section.names: section\ and\ label x\ section\ and\ label implicit-target
section.title: X SECTION AND LABEL
section.comment: This section's label and section title are different.
This case, the section have 2 target id.
section.paragraph: X SECTION AND LABEL POINT TO implicit-target AND X SECTION AND LABEL POINT TO section-and-label.

section.title: X EXPLICIT-TARGET
section.comment: This section's label equals to section title.
This case, a duplicated target id is generated by docutils.
section.paragraph: X EXPLICIT-TARGET POINT TO explicit-target AND X EXPLICIT-TARGET POINT TO DUPLICATED ID LIKE id1.

section.names: implicit\ section\ name x\ implicit\ section\ name
section.title: X IMPLICIT SECTION NAME
section.comment: This case, the section have one id.
section.paragraph: X IMPLICIT SECTION NAME POINT TO implicit-section-name.

section.title: X DUPLICATED SUB SECTION
section.comment: This section have no label, but name will be duplicated by next section.
This case, the section have one id.
section.paragraph: `X DUPLICATED SUB SECTION`_ IS BROKEN LINK.
section.comment: There is no way to link to this section's ``duplicated-sub-section``` by

section.title: X DUPLICATED SUB SECTION
section.comment: This section have no label, but the section was a duplicate name.
This case, a duplicated target id is generated by docutils.
There is no way to link to this section's duplicated id like ``id2`` by

section.names: label\ bridged\ target\ section x\ label\ bridged\ target\ section
section.title: X LABEL BRIDGED TARGET SECTION
section.comment: This section is targeted through label definition.
section.paragraph: X bridge label IS NOT TRANSLATABLE BUT LINKED TO TRANSLATED SECTION TITLE.
X bridge label POINT TO LABEL BRIDGED TARGET SECTION AND bridge label2 POINT TO SECTION AND LABEL. THE SECOND APPEARED bridge label2 POINT TO CORRECT TARGET.
